attributes.action: All former PMs & Speakers should automatically be knighted & made members of the Order of the Garter, apart from being members of the Privy Council
attributes.additional_details: All former PMs & Speakers should automatically be knighted & made members of the Order of the Garter, apart from being members of the Privy Council. This is to formally recognise the former Prime Minister’s & Speaker’s status, stature, knowledge and experience. This will ensure fair unbiased treatment & recognition of all former Prime Ministers & Speakers regardless of political party affinities & persuasions. Of course if a former PM or Speaker was ousted, resign or impeached in disgrace due committing serious offences, then the House of Commons should decide whether or not they should automatically knighted & made members of the Order of the Garter.
